title: Irish Creme Killer
description: MORE ADVENTURES WITH MISSY AND CHAS!!!  Summer Prescott Books is thrilled to announce the first book in the INNcredibly Sweet Series – Irish Crème Killer!!! For those of you who love Missy, Chas and the rest of the gang from the Frosted Love series, this next chapter in their story will take you on a wild ride through the Catskills, as Chas revisits his well-heeled past. Spencer and Janssen team up to face a most unexpected villain in this fast-paced tale of greed, jealousy and intrigue.
author: Summer  Prescott
